0.1.name: wordpress/spotted-koi-excerpt-manager
0.1.description: This plugin gives you an admin management page under "Settings" which will allow you to manage all of your excerpt settings in one place, without the need for modifying your theme files. It will override any theme or plugin excerpt settings, by simply overriding them. You can manage everything: Excerpt length, Read More text, pre-Read More text, post-read more text, and whether or not you show read more text.
